channel.title: Someone help me with commands

item.title: Someone help me with commands
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

[Code] else if (command.startsWith(“syell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >=1)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).trim();

            if(muted == 1)
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
            else
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "System Message -"+command.substring(5);
}

else if (command.startsWith("smsg") && command.length() > 4 && playerRights >=2)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).trim();

            if(muted == 1)
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
            else
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ""+command.substring(5);
}

[/Code]
Should be

if (command.startsWith("syell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >=1)
	{

command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
command.substring(5).trim();

                if(muted == 1) {
                sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
                } else {
	   PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "System Message -"+command.substring(5);
	   }
}
if (command.startsWith("smsg") && command.length() > 4 && playerRights >=2)
	{

command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
command.substring(5).trim();

                if(muted == 1) {
                sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
                } else {
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ""+command.substring(5);
	}
}

That should work, you needed to tell it to execute commands by using } and { and also I don’t know if you needed the else before the very first lines so I took them off, Add them back if needed.

Read full topic

item.title: Someone help me with commands
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

I have tried to make a ::syell and ::smsg command. The syell command would make it say:

“System Message - MESSAGE HERE”

smsg would be:

“MESSAGE HERE”

Here are my command codes.

[code] else if (command.startsWith(“syell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >=1)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).trim();

            if(muted == 1)
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
            else
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "System Message -"+command.substring(5);
}

else if (command.startsWith("smsg") && command.length() > 4 && playerRights >=2)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).trim();

            if(muted == 1)
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
            else
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ""+command.substring(5);
}[/code]

But, when I compile I get an error of:

“else without if”

Or something like that, can anyone shed some light?

Read full topic
